website_summaries.verdict: This highly rated machine is a great buy for people who want to groom their animals at home without paying for professional quality.
pros: Purposely built with lower noise levels to keep pets from being frightened or surprised
Relatively easy to transport and store
cons: A few customers had issues with the product's durability

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer. I had a 2 speed 2 hp force dryer previously. The variable speed is wonderful for getting around the dogs head and ears. You can dial down the speed so that the air is not so strong in their faces. The 4 hp motor is wonderful, I have American Eskimos, and it would normally take me 4 hours to show groom my boy. This dryer cut my drying time in more than half. It was great watching the water just fly off him.
customer_reviews.author: Pj Wills

customer_reviews.title: Funtio
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 terriers with long hair I show. On bath day it used to take most of the day to dry their hair. Now its just a matter of a couple of hours for both plus it has a variable speed which I love since I like more power on some parts of their hair ans less power on the more delicate hair. The price was much cheaper than at stores or dog shows. I have had this for 5 years and it still works great. I haven’t had any problems with it
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Dog Grooming Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dryer for drying our 48lb Labradoodle. It does not blow out heated air, however. It does eventually blow out lukewarm air after the motor warms up. Because it is powerful, it takes a fraction of the time to get his fleece coat dry, which is huge.
customer_reviews.author: cac

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I find it works well; it blows the water off like the hand air-dryers in public bathrooms. My border collie isn't crazy about it, but I am not crazy about her hair all over the place, so we will continue to use it! The warranty says it does not cover the appliance if it falls. I thought that amusing until it almost fell...now I have my dog on a step-stool/workbench and the appliance on the floor and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: I like that it blows cool air so dogs can't be ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful dryer and does what I need it to do. I like that it blows cool air so dogs can't be burned (but does take a little longer to dry this way). With that being said, it's loudish and startles many of the dogs. I usually start it at the end of the bath and let it run a bit before I start drying so dogs get used to the sound. Had two times where I flipped the switch to start it and it didn't start...will send another review if this becomes a real issue since I've only been using it for five months.
customer_reviews.author: wnyer

customer_reviews.title: I love this dryer.
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer. The variable speed is wonderful for getting around the dogs head and ears. You can dial down the speed so that the air is not so strong in their faces. The 4 hp motor is wonderful, This dryer cut my drying time in more than half.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I am glad I spent the extra
customer_reviews.text: I got the variable speed model, and I am glad I spent the extra, because full or even half power could be too much for a smaller dog. This is a true professional product, built like a tank. It is heavy and loud on full power, but it gets the job done, very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this 4
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this 4.0 HP dryer. Blow dried my aussie in quick time. The variable speed is the best, so is the temp of the air coming out. I have groomed horses, and short hair dogs, but this is my first dog with a long coat. I previously used my human hair dryer a few times and it was slow, too hot, even though I was careful not to burn my dogs skin. This is the ultimate dryer. Hope it lasts a long time. Thanks CherryBrook for FAST service. My dog looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We our Metro Air Force once a week on our ...
customer_reviews.text: We our Metro Air Force once a week on our Havanese (kept in long show coat). While there is not heating element for this product, running at max generates sufficient heat within the housing to warm the exhaust air just enough. I was on the fence with regard to getting the variable speed model. Please do not think twice about getting this model. It is well worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the better half for Christmas last year. She loves it. She has 3 long haired herding dogs that she show in various events and now that she has this blower she says it cuts way down on her prep time. They also go to the local rivers and lakes and it blows them dry quickly and gets rid of a lot of the sand. Which makes me happy as little of it comes in the house.
customer_reviews.author: MarkinAK

customer_reviews.title: Great littel dryer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely essential piece of equipment for a groomer to have......a good force dryer. Of course they make larger units with a larger air volume but at home this unit has been great. It has a variable speed control which I think is invaluable and has the umph it takes to push some air. It is also portable enough to be moved around or used on mobile clients.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hacker

customer_reviews.title: Not to be underestimated!
customer_reviews.text: Now this is the gizmo that I should have kept! Upon the advice of a pro-breeder, I ordered the Master Blaster and returned it due to the mess that it made. I found this dryer to be perfect....but it was not to the specifications of the mentor breeder. It was returned....and the Master Blaster was reordered. The bottom line is that everyone has an opinion and I believe that this would have been the better dryer for my dog. It is smaller, costs half the price and would have done just as good of a job.
customer_reviews.author: PJRoss

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can control the speed of the air blowing. The one I had before only had 2 swtiches, high or low. (Same brand) It gets strong! Love this dryer. Very easy to maintain and store.
customer_reviews.author: Mirna

customer_reviews.title: Love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer. My Border Collie has a more then average coat of fur, like 2 times more then most Border Collies. This dried him within the hour and he did not mind the sound, not very loud at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Dog dryer
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! Should have bought this ages ago! Did all 5 pekingese today in about 2 hours! What a time saver. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Sean norton

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: You get so much for so little! Love this dryer. It has cut my grooming time in half! Perfect for mobile and/or in home groomers!
customer_reviews.author: NDN Groomer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, portable, output is strong enough to dry well, but not so loud it scares my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: We are a grooming salon and have 3 of these ...
customer_reviews.text: We are a grooming salon and have 3 of these and 3 of the standard on/off model. We MUCH PREFER the variable.
customer_reviews.author: J.C. & Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 German Shepherds.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fast and efficient way to dry two large dogs. I also use it to dry my vehicles! I would love a longer hose for that.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully, and I love that I can change the amount of air that comes out depending on the dog and coat:)
customer_reviews.author: TNTGOATS

customer_reviews.title: Works great I have 4 dogs I am glad I got ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great I have 4 dogs I am glad I got the adjustable speed they really don't like the high speed.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Barrett

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: It works great I just was hoping for a little more air pressure.
customer_reviews.author: mlm99

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful for my personal dogs with long or double coats ...
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful for my personal dogs with long or double coats in addition to my foster rescue dogs that need to be groomed as soon as they get to my home from the shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Gandee

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is a groomer in Utah. Every time we go there she does our little one. I can never get her fluffy like she can. She showed me what to get. We ordered this blower. And wow! It's on!,, This blower does the job in half the time. And she looks professionally done. Worth every cent
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Carbon dust
customer_reviews.text: Owned and used for 3 months and has covered my cat in carbon dust
customer_reviews.author: tracey weaver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well this down into the undercoat on my dog
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: It works fine. Not as powerful as you may think after ...
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. Not as powerful as you may think after reading some of the reviews. Definitely dosnt cut drying time in half.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: the variable speed is very useful..
customer_reviews.text: this machine well blow over a small dog if turned up to ten....the variable speed is very useful...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Plan to be patient
customer_reviews.text: My big dog hates this - and it is too slow to dry him. Nothing wrong with machine, just not a good idea...
customer_reviews.author: Joan L

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable speed is a must for getting a dog used to the dryer. Very powerful on high speed, and very portable. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine J. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: My five Jack, Parson, Russels love it. The variable speed is the key for them to line up for a back rub! The fact that there is no heat involved actually works better than a hair dryer, which is never the right temp. I thought it might bother their ears and had put in cotton balls, but they shook them out, didn't need them. My Russies' have three types of coats, and they vary from tiny to normal size. I am surpised at how powerful this unit is. Doubt that I'll ever use it at full speed, but glad to have it just in case. Now, if they would just wait to take their turn, I'd be a happy camper!!!.
customer_reviews.author: shortcake

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Dryer
customer_reviews.text: After deciding to groom my Cavaliers at home I quickly realized my hair dryer was useless for drying a dog. I chose the variable unit so I could adjust not only air speed but also start at the lowest setting to reduce noise. The dryer does a great job on the dogs and the noise level on this unit is quiet. I do wish the air was slightly warm as it sure feels cold to me at this time of the year. It does warm slightly after running for awhile. The 4.0 HP unit will also help in drying my dual sport motorcycles.
customer_reviews.author: Junieblue

customer_reviews.title: ANY ONE WITH A DOG NEEDS TO HAVE THIS DRYER!!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power!!! THE DRYING TIME WAS 1/4 OF WHAT I HAVE BEEN DOING IN THE PAST.. I have a Lab & with their double coat I WAS SO HAPPY AT HOW QUICK I DRYED HER!! I VERY HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Strese

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recomend for anyone who wants to hand dry there dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolina N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! very quiet, compact and powerful. very good price. even when drying cats, they do not scare. The best.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Even the dogs like it! Does a great job for our Goldens.
customer_reviews.author: Michaele C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like variable speed to gradually get dog used to the sound and feel. Not as noises as expected.
customer_reviews.author: barbara m. wood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and to pack. Has plenty of power for big coated breeds.
customer_reviews.author: T Craig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, dries your dog much faster than the ordinary one.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolay D.

customer_reviews.title: great blower, great for husky breed dogs
customer_reviews.text: We bought a 4 horse power but it lacked the power to really blow the hair off of them but this one is excellent.!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ray

customer_reviews.title: Nice dryer
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job on all dogs. Adjustable speed works well. Hose is a lot narrower than previous models we have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my Bichpoo. I was trying to use my hair dryer and that really wasn't working - not strong enough to blow his fur out nicely, left it too curly and took too long- so I broke down and bought this and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bichpoo Mom

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had warm air!!!! too expensive for one air setting
customer_reviews.author: L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Metro Air Force
customer_reviews.text: I had these shipped to south América where I currently live. Here the voltage is 220 and it was hell trying to find a transformer that could take 4 HP. This is quite heavy and loud and as You can imagine adding the transformer it is quite a task getting ready to use it. My dog runs away as soon as He sees I start setting it and it takes forever to do it. Also the power is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: MariaEugenia Jiménez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that prodact because , I got it with big defects in can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Metro Air Force Steel Commander Variable Speed Dog Dryer, 4.0 HP
product_meta.description:
MetroVac
For over 60 years, the Metropolitan Vacuum Cleaner Co., Inc. (Metrovac) has been creating and manufacturing its line of vacuum cleaners that have revolutionized the industry with powerful cleaning abilities combined with practical features like portability and high efficiency. Since the 1980’s, Metrovac has engineered and manufactured dog grooming dryers and has become an international leader in the dog grooming market. High quality and efficiency are Metrovac’s cornerstones.

Metro Air Force Commander Professional Pet Dryer
Metrovac’s Air Force Commander Dog Grooming Dryer is one of the top dog grooming tools that professionals and non-professionals alike turn to for drying their short-haired dogs’ fur without using heat that dries out their coats or makes them uncomfortable. The Air Force Commander is a combination of portability with highly efficient drying that gives you the power and speed of a large, commercial dryer with the compact design and ease of use of a portable machine, cutting drying time for short-haired dogs by two-thirds. If you offer mobile dog grooming services or just want to spend less time grooming your pets, the Air Force Commander Dog Grooming Dryer features several attachments like an air concentrator, air flare tool, and a groomer rake that give you excellent results

METRO Deliberately Made In The USA


• Made of sturdy all steel
• 4.0 HP Variable Speed motor
• Size: 12" x 7" x 7"
• Weight: 6 pounds
• 1 Year Warranty

Provided By: FBD
feature_bullets: Portable, fast dog grooming dryer saves you time and effort by quickly drying short-haired large and small dogs in two-thirds less time than normal
Compact and lightweight – use on the floor or table top, standing vertically or horizontally
Quickly and efficiently dry pets fur without drying out their coats, control the flow of air, and use versatile attachments, including an air concentrator, air flare tool, and a groomer rake
6 foot hose gives you ample length to move around dogs and reach those hard to dry places, and 12 foot cord
Hard-working 4.0HP motor and easy-to-replace filter give you good air flow to quickly dry animals coats, reducing the amount of time necessary to keep pet groomed
